Property.name: grunt
Property.HelpText: Use amy grunt sound when homing attack.

Property.name: bird
Property.HelpText: Allow Amy to have her cool bird following her, she can have the Blue one or the Gamma one. (Random will give you one of them when entering a stage.)

Property.name: amyAdventure
Property.HelpText: [Experimental] Turn this on to ALWAYS play Amy. Have no fear, Amy Rose is here. (Some exceptions may apply.)

Property.name: hammerRotFix
Property.HelpText: The SA1 Hammer model hierarchy is different and require a rotation fix, some Amy skins might need it as well so this option is here just in case. (if unsure, leave this to false)

Property.name: HammerJumpButton
Property.HelpText: Press the specified button while running to do a Hammer Jump.

Property.name: HammerAttackButton
Property.HelpText: Press the specified button to attack with the hammer.

Property.name: HammerAirButton
Property.HelpText: Press the specified button while in the air to attack with the hammer.

Property.name: HammerPropButton
Property.HelpText: Hold the specified button while in air to do the Hammer Propeller.
